revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (3), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (3)

|brand = Dell |model = Wyse 3020 Thin / Zero Client |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = thin client |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RYK-WUBR507N |icid = 9557A-WUBR507N |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 6050A2595001-MB-A02 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;PXA2128; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q32FVSIG; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC |fla2chip = SK hynix;H26M31001HPR; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC4G63CFR-PBA; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN7500; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:80:64 |oui = 00:0E:8E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 4 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 3.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 5-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CONN1 |jtag = yes,, 16-pin header,, CONN2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DVI-I, DVI-D, Audio out (3.5mm), power switch, RTC w/ battery, speaker |addchip = 1MB Serial Flash;Winbond;W25Q80DV;;1;,,, HDTV/VGA/DVI Encoder;Chrontel;CH7033;;1;,,, 2Kb 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;24C02N;;1;,,, 256Kb 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C256;;1;,,, Autonomous Audio Headset Switch;TI;TS3A225E;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, OLPC Keyboard Controller;ENE Technology;KB3930;;1;,,, USB Hub and Flash Media Controller;SMSC;USB4640;;1;,,, 3A 5V 1MHz Synchronous Buck Converter;Anpec;APW8804;;1;,,, 3A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG877;;1;,,, DDR Termination Regulator;Global Mixed-mode Tech;G2997;;1;,,, UHS Dual Buffer with 3-State Output;Fairchild;NC7WZ126;;1;,,, 4-bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXS0104E;;4;,,, Dual Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51225;;1;,,, 2A Current Limit High Side Switch;Rohm;BD82032;;4;,,, 30V N-Channel AlphaMOS;Alpha & Omega;AON7752;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7410;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Inventec |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Linux
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 04/30/2018 |fccapprovdate = 11/24/2010 |estreldate = 08/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA6ZPBAK6649 |asin = B01AH0QXT4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SparkLAN WUBR-507N(M) |rad1modif = USB (non-standard connector) |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3572; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM: [[Inventec]] • PCB ID: 6050A2595001-MB-A02 (JANUS)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] PXA2128 @1.2GHz Dual-core ARMv7 *Video: DVI-I Dual Link, DVI-D Dual Link ports *Storage: 4MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 4GB (eMMC) *Memory: [[SK hynix]] 2GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Ralink]] RT3572 802.11abgn (2T2R) *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/2.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.wysechoice.co.uk/p/dell-wyse-3020-wifi-t10d-4gf-2gr-909642-02l Spec.] *[https://linux-mmp.docs.kernel.org/dell-wyse-3020.html ''Dell Wyse 3020'' on '''Linux on Marvell MMP''']
